name: Aranara
desc: Greater Lord Rukkhadevata's familiars and spirits of the forest.

customize.name: Rukkhadevata
customize.desc: The Goddess of Wisdom, the previous Dendro Archon, and a friend of Nabu Malikata and King Deshret. She was completely erased from Irminsul to save it from forbidden knowledge.

customize.text: The Greater Lord planted the Ashvattha Tree, from which the Aranara were born. They are her familiars (after all information of Greater Lord Rukkhadevata was erased from

customize.name: Irminsul
customize.desc: Irminsul can be thought of as a large tree growing downwards rather than upwards, containing all the knowledge and wisdom of the world from ancient times to the present. Ley Lines, like the roots of Irminsul, cross the earth, absorbing the memories of the world.

customize.text: , the Aranara became considered the familiars of

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

customize.text:
).
The Traveler's Sibling
Nara Varuna, who saved the forest 500 years ago
Pari
Dendro Archon's familiars
Vanarana
Aranara's home

customize.name: Aramuhukunda
customize.desc: The first Aranara.

customize.name: Araja
customize.desc: An Aranara, who placed Vanarana in dreams to protect it.

customize.text: One of the eldest Aranara, who hid Vanarana in dreams sacrificing their physical body and turning into the Tree of Dreams.

customize.name: Arama
customize.desc: An Aranara, who became a new Ashvattha Tree.

customize.text: Aranara who turned into the Ashvattha Tree to get

customize.name: Bija
customize.desc: The crystallization of what is most precious to Aranara. It is not only a fruit but also a seed of hope.

customize.name: Arana
customize.desc: An Aranara caring for her human friend, Rana.

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc: Rana is a quest-exclusive NPC. She is a Forest Ranger from the Vimara Village.

customize.text: 's friend who was trying to save her from the Withering.

customize.name: Ararycan
customize.desc: An Aranara responsible for the forest in Devantaka Mountain.

customize.text: Aranara who takes care of the Devantaka Mountain's forest.

customize.name: Aramani
customize.desc: An Aranara found in Mahavanaranapna. Aramani will sell local specialties from Sumeru.

customize.name: Aravinay
customize.desc: An Aranara found in Mahavanaranapna. Aravinay will exchange Forging Blueprints for stories.

customize.name: Aranyaka
customize.desc:
Arama handed this book over to you.

It seems to have witnessed the passage of many years. By the look of things, someone used to keep records in it, but none of that can be retrieved now.

Use it to document your shared adventure with Arama.

customize.name: Arapandu's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Arapandu.

Can power the Varuna Contraption and adjust the amount of water contained within the earth, thus breathing new life into the forest.

customize.name: Arakanta's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Arakanta.

Arakanta used to love hanging out with Rishboland Tigers. But now, he has created a new game for his Nara friend.

customize.name: Aranakula's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Aranakula.

Fearful though Aranakula was, this little creature still ventured into the Fungus-infested forest to tend to "the Memory of Stone."

customize.name: Arakunti's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Arakunti.

Happy moments spent with friends are like Nilotpala Lotuses in the water.

customize.name: Arakara's Flower
customize.desc:
"A flower gifted to you by Arakara.

For Arakara, who nurtures Viparyas, flowers given to friends must be most precious indeed.

customize.name: Araesha's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Araesha.

The biggest mystery is perhaps why Araesha describes the riddles as being "delicious"... Is it because they are all about food?"

customize.name: Arana's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Arana.

You promised Arana that the evil shall be punished.

customize.name: Arabalika's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Arabalika.

It seems to contain the power to destroy a Ruin Guard with one strike.

customize.name: Aranaga's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Aranaga

"Season of rain returns, plants rejoice... The pomegranate sings, the apples clap."

customize.name: Aragaru's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Aragaru

"Old leaves, swollen fruit... Drifted dreams, fallen flowers."

customize.name: Araja's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Araja.

Araja seems to have lost important memories.

customize.name: Ararycan's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Ararycan.

There is neither soil nor water inside the Ruin Golem. It must be a nightmarish place for Ararycan.

customize.name: Aranakin's Flower
customize.desc:
A flower gifted to you by Aranakin

"Wind that doesn't return, water that doesn't flow backwards... Sweet dreams and bitter aftertastes."

customize.name: Aralila and Aranishat's Flowers
customize.desc:
Flowers gifted by Aralila and Aranishat.

We ourselves are the strongest. Of that, there is no doubt!

customize.name: Garland
customize.desc:
A garland woven by Arama.

Garlands of this kind represent the blessings from all of Vanarana and once channeled endless powers during the fight with Marana's Avatar. But their blazing light has now faded, perhaps because they burned so relentlessly.

Every flower on the garland is connected with the lovely, tiny heart of an Aranara, and all of them together constitute the gate to Mahavanaranapna. Aranara will support those who wear such garlands. As friends, they ease the wearers' pains, ward off their nightmares, aid them through lightless days, and fill the emptiness in their hearts.

customize.name: Bija
customize.desc: The crystallization of what is most precious to Aranara. It is not only a fruit but also a seed of hope.

customize.name: Withered Kusava
customize.desc: Entirely drained of strength, the Kusava appears withered. Yet the seed, which preserves precious memories, is still alive.

customize.name: "Kusava"
customize.desc:
Equip it to utilize the power of Aranara.

"Fatty fruit, bitter fruit."

A temporary home for Aranara memories. Kusava makes Aranara strong.

customize.name: Vintage Lyre
customize.desc:
Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs. It may work wonders when played in the forests of Sumeru.

A vintage lyre borrowed from Amadhiah in Vimara Village.

Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song. Bards from there tend to address their instruments as "Friend" or "Partner." Thus, one of them trusting Amadhiah with the instrument was nothing less than a gesture of intimacy and trust.

customize.name: Zohrah Mushroom
customize.desc: One of the ingredients for making the elixir Arahaoma. "Zohrah" is said to mean "lost in a tipsy dream."

customize.name: Barsam Flower
customize.desc: One of the ingredients for making the elixir Arahaoma. "Barsam" is said to be a sacred tree that has long vanished in history.

customize.name: Vasoma Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit with mysterious powers. Bija is indispensable for helping Rana, and the Vasoma Fruit is indispensable for obtaining Bija.

customize.name: Arahaoma
customize.desc: An elixir of Aranara. A mere drop of it is all it takes to unveil Aranara's pure and pristine dreams to the forest.

customize.name: Dried Flower
customize.desc: A flower pressed inside the Adventure Handbook. It seems to have preserved someone's lost memories...

customize.name: "The Best Water"
customize.desc: Water collected in Vanarana, clear, cold and refreshing - a leaf falling on top of it would look as if floating in the air. This is transparent water of extraordinary quality.
